thread.title: Vanessa and Kobe Bryant: 23 years of marriage
thread.title_full: Vanessa and Kobe Bryant: 23 years of marriage

author: Shirley Gómez
title: Vanessa and Kobe Bryant: 23 years of marriage
text:
By Shirley Gómez - New York April 18, 2024 4:45 PM EDT In a heartfelt tribute, Vanessa Bryant , 41, took to Instagram on Thursday, April 18, to commemorate 23 years of marriage to her late husband, Kobe Bryant . Sharing a collage of cherished moments captured during one of their date nights, Vanessa encapsulated the love and joy that defined their relationship.
The collage, composed of four throwback pictures, captured the essence of their bond. Kobe, dapper in a suit and tie, exuded charisma and elegance, while Vanessa radiated in a sparkling dress.
©GettyImages
“Happy Anniversary @kobebryant ❤️ #23,” Vanessa wrote in the caption, carrying celebration and remembrance. The post resonated with fans and their eldest daughter, Natalia Bryant , who showered her mother’s tribute with three red hearts.
Related Natalia Bryant credits Kobe Bryant for sparking her love for Taylor Swift
Naomi Osaka’s relatable reason why she wonders if Kobe Bryant is disappointed in her
‘Mamba Mondays’ reflects on Kobe Bryant’s advocacy for women’s basketball
Vanessa’s commemoration extended to Instagram Stories, where she added a gif of a wedding ring, symbolizing the eternal commitment they shared, alongside “Anniversary” by Tony! Toni! Toné!, a song that undoubtedly held significance in their journey together.
The love story between Kobe and Vanessa began in 1999 when they first crossed paths on a music video set. At the time, Kobe was a rising star in the NBA, just 20 years old, while Vanessa, 17, was embarking on her journey. Their initial encounter blossomed into a whirlwind romance.
Ver esta publicación en Instagram Una publicación compartida por Kobe Bryant (@kobebryant)
Kobe proposed to Vanessa shortly after her 18th birthday. On April 18, 2001, they exchanged vows, pledging to stand by each other through life’s joys and challenges.
Throughout their marriage, Kobe and Vanessa navigated the complexities of fame, fortune, and the demands of public scrutiny. Together, they built a loving family with four daughters who embodied their parents‘ spirit and resilience.
Tragically, Kobe’s untimely passing on January 26, 2020 , shook the world, leaving an indelible void in the hearts of those who admired him. Yet, amidst the grief and sorrow, Vanessa’s strength and love for Kobe and their daughters are still intact.
